title: Missouri Digest

see-also.note: Digest of the Decisions of the Courts of Missouri

additional-notes: This was originally published in 31 volumes starting in late 1929.  Volumes were not published in numeric order, and some were reissued later in revised editions.  Do not assume without a thorough search that any given volume published the year of the first renewal shown here or later is out of copyright, even if the volume number is lower than the volume number of the first renewal shown here.
Renewals for volumes in this series were generally filed under Books, not under Periodicals.
